name: Hercosul - Three Pocket Dogs
description: Made in Feevale Game Jam, which event was promoted by Hercosul. There was 19 teams making a game for the competition, and 2 of them was selected winners. This sadly wasn't one of those, but HEY, I enjoyed making it! It was made to play on Android devices, so, besides the web game, I'm uploading and apk for those who want to try it!
